Summary:
MAIB report on the investigation of a fatal accident to the skipper of fishing vessel Our Boy Andrew, 9 miles east of Eddystone Rocks on 24 March 2011. Report No 23/2011. Published 17 November 2011.

body:
MAIB report on the investigation of a fatal accident to the skipper of fishing vessel Our Boy Andrew, 9 miles east of Eddystone Rocks on 24 March 2011. Report No 23/2011. Published 17 November 2011.

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (3,557.73 kb) 

A safety flyer was also produced for this incident and can be viewed on our website:
